TextLibrary.Text: Guardsman
I'm looking for a man named Syrus Darkhunter. Does he live around here?
I'm looking for a man named Syrus Darkhunter. Does he live around here?
I'm looking for a man named Syrus Darkhunter. Does he live around here?
I'm looking for a man named Syrus Darkhunter. Does he live around here?
Darkhunter, eh? You won't find him here. He seldom enters the city.

Darkhunter, eh? You won't find him here. He seldom enters the city.
Darkhunter, eh? You won't find him here. He seldom enters the city.
Do you know where I can find him?
Do you know where I can find him?
Do you know where I can find him?
Do you know where I can find him?
He's difficult to find unless he WANTS to be found. I heard a rumor that he was tracking some creatures down near the Ruins of Artum. You might try there.
